meanings.definition: To call out to attract attention
meanings.sent1: She hailed her friend from across the street to get her attention.
meanings.sent2: The lifeguard hailed the swimmer to come closer to the shore.
meanings.sent3: The lost puppy hailed passersby with its adorable puppy eyes.
meanings.sent4: The beacon light hailed ships to safety in the stormy night.
meanings.sent5: The teacher hailed the student who raised their hand first to answer the question.
